There are a small set of very easy mini games, that aren't necessarily very fun or difficult. They are however a means to an end. At the end of every mini game you get a piece of Furry hentai. There is no more to it than that. The images all get saved in your little fap gallery.

And for what it is worth, this game gets my recommendation alone just for compiling a collection of some extremely high quality Furry hentai. At the extremely cheap price point it sells for (.99 cents) if this is your niche, I say it's worth your time.

That's the end of the review. What do you want from me? Go fap now."[/i]

110855553.review:
to begin, the acheivements are honestly quite easy to get in this game. you can get i think 3-4 in the title screen itself, which makes sense considering that there are 100 acheivements you can get total. in less than one hour, i managed to get 77.

the artwork in this game is honestly pretty good to my liking! if there are any links to all of the artwork in the game, i'd appreciate it. honestly, for a $1 USD furry game, the artwork really stood out. loved it a lot!

the games are fairly easy, except for Furry Cutter, (currently stuck on level 2 at the time of writing this) and Rock Paper Scissors, although from rounds 1-3 you can just spam the buttons and win pretty quickly. 

Rounds 4 and 5, that isn't really possible, because if you lose then one random piece of the image gets removed, so you have to get lucky and just guess at times. took me about 10 minutes to complete, but it may take longer.

the only minigame i have a complaint about is the Furry Pacman game, mainly the movement of the rabbit/bunny (the player's character) being quite glitchy at times, feeling a considerably long delay for what felt like up to half a second or more, or the position of the character being in an incorrect spot.

otherwise, the pacman game is quite simple. you do not need to collect all of the pellets, but i'd say about 85-90% of them to complete the round. pretty much works as intended, except for the movement at times.

[b]OVERALL RATING: 9/10[/b]

108311865.review:
This game saved my life.

I am 28.

My ex-girfriend and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. 

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

After 100% the game. Where do I even start? I'm honestly at a loss for words...This game is...Everything...Its everything I could've wished for...First off may I say the gameplay is FANTASTIC!!! Its very easy to use and runs so so so smoothly. I can tell you guys put your worth into this. The gameplay is endless and keeps you on edge. In the Furrman gamemode I had spent the most time on. I had to prove myself to see the furry queens I wanted to be rewarded with. I was being edged...slapped in the face...excuse my language but even blueballed...However, the hard work I put into that gamemode alone payed off as my lust had been fulfilled everytime I had beast the levels. As the levels got harder, I did too. Enough of me though. 
The second hardest game mode had to have been the rock paper scissors game. Everytime I won a round a part of a picture would appear and id get so excited but...sometimes you cant get what you want. This game WANTS you to prove yourself. Are you worthy? Should you even be able to see these heavenly pieces of art? These are things I had thought to myself everytime I had lost a round of rock paper scissors. I cant describe the amount of regret and dread that flowed through my veins. I could feel myself melt as a section of the reward is stripped away from my screen. But how could I complain? I hadn't even payed for the game. I had to show I was fit for the long rounds of rock paper scissor just to achieve the victory and claim my prize. 
Finally, the hardest gamemode. The puzzle was the hardest for a number of reasons. The prize is sitting at your disposal, but its broken into pieces. When I saw my furry queens broken apart all I could do is cry. This game does a very good job at getting to your emotions that sometimes I even forgot I was just playing a game. It truly felt like a reality. Imagine you walk into a room to see a loved one torn apart, limbs spread across the floor, and all you can do is wish for them to be put back together and brought back to normal. Thats how I felt but maybe even worse. The gamemode was hard because of the amount of emotions running around my mind...I felt as if I was going to faint, only being able to hold a furry queens pussy with a nice cock either on the inside or out and thats not what I wanted...I wanted the full picture. I couldnt focus and I couldnt figure out which piece went where. Shaking, I try to place each piece in their respective spot, but I had failed multiple times. Worrying I wont be able to see another full image again. I was on the brink of failure...I thought to myself "Im a failure to my dearest friend...the money he worked hard for...gone to waste." I couldn't let him down like that. I sat up high and began at work once again. After a long while of what felt like an eternity, I had finally finished each puzzle level. 
Again, sorry for my profound language but, I ejaculated countless amount of times. I couldn't contain the amount of lust, love, and closeness I felt to these girls. For a long time I had thought I had always been gay. Bought and was gifted a multitude of boys love games but I had to try something new. I truly doubt I will ever move to a different game. 
Now some of you may be steered away by the harshness of the gamemodes but might I tell you, its definitely worth it.
If it hadn't been my birthday today, I wouldn't have been so enlightened by such an amazing game, gifted by my good friend Alex. 
I am going to add one last thing. The art in this game is absolutely astonishing. You could see every crevice of each female appearing character and it made me want to cry. Even after every climax from each picture, I just had to sit and stare at their beauty. I honestly felt as if I was really in front of a real furry. The thought of them gripping my penis with anything they could made me feel incredible. I can only imagine the hours of work put into the art, true artisans at work in your studio.
My only complaint is that there isnt enough art that suits my fancy. I think the game could use some amputee, diaper, pregnant, pooping, lactating, feet, and vore. I hope you can add these in your latest game. 
Thank you for producing this life changing experience.

-Lain

Here a beautiful speech regarding the inner connections between purpose (dreams) and friends relationships. 


"They are driven to pursue it, and they pursue it solely for their own sake, no other. One man's dream can hold dominion over the entire world, for one who dedicates his life to the forging of a single sword. While many can pursue their dreams in solitude, other dreams are like great storms blowing hundreds even thousands of dreams apart in their wake. They are my able soldiers it's true, they are dedicated comrades who sacrifice themselves for my dream so that it might be real. But that does not make them friends. In my mind a true friend never relies on another's dream. The man, who would be my friend, must have his own reason for living, beyond me. ADVERTENCIA DE MUCHO TEXTO + SPOILERS DE MINIJUEGOS

Para empezar, a este juego lo consegui a traves de una pagina de keys, lo he jugado para conseguir las cromos, y el 100% de logros (ez) sin embargo, no es del todo perfecto

El menu se ve bien y creativo, pero tiene errores, al salir de un nivel y al cambiar de minijuego te muestra los niveles completados de un minijuego que nunca jugaste, y para deshacer el bug te toca reiniciar el juego, pero eso no es todo

El segundo modo esta muy bug, el personaje se puede quedar quieto aunque presiones las teclas, hasta que de alguna forma se libera y los otros enemigos solo desaparecen al empezar

Y no hablemos del tercero, que a partir de los niveles 7-9 es casi imposible de completar, a menos que tengas la suerte de que todas las caras se queden atrapadas en un sitio, ademas de eso, te dan una cantidad limitada de movimientos, que ya lo hace mas tedioso todavia (no hay logros para esos pero son necesarios para el ultimo)

El arte es muy bueno, es lo que te inspira (y bastante) a terminarte los niveles, es el punto mas positivo para mi del juego

Y no voy a dar mi opinion sobre el soundtrack, ya que no lo escuche del todo

No lo recomiendo, pese al buen arte que tiene, es muy injugable y terminas usando los cheats para saltear niveles y pierden la emocion

Aqui termina mi reseña, hay mucho texto pero bueno, si vas a escribir una reseña, hay que hacerlo bien, el mucho texto al menos te sirve para ver si vale la pena vender unas cromos para agarrar el juego, en fin, un saludo a los que hayan leido la reseña hasta el final

106264290.review:
This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ing minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

102439864.review:
What a game...

The artstyle: flawless, the music: inspirational, the puzzles: mindblowing.
10/10 this is a must play for any puzzle and/or furry enthusiasts.

What I really respect about this game is its lack of hand-holding. It is relentless. Furry cutter level 9 is one of the most difficult feats I have achieved in my gaming career, harder than all of the bosses in the Dark Souls series combined.

The deep connections I made with each and every one of the game's cast are something to behold. The anger at DJ Khaled's betrayal in furry cutter The tears at the death of Sexy Fox. The despair at Funny Bunny's decent into madness. The happiness as Commander finally overcame his rivals...

This game is simply something you must experience for yourself.

(not a furry btw)

101061835.review:
On 25 November 1988, Miyano and Minato wandered around Misato with the intention of robbing and raping local women.[8] At 8:30 p.m., they spotted Furuta riding her bike home after she had finished a shift at her job. Under Miyano's orders, Minato kicked Furuta off her bike and fled the scene.[8] Miyano, under the pretense of witnessing the attack by coincidence, approached Furuta and offered to walk her home safely.[8] Furuta, accepting this offer, was unaware that Miyano was leading her to a nearby warehouse, where he revealed his yakuza connections. He raped her in the warehouse and again in a nearby hotel, threatening to kill her. From the hotel, Miyano called Minato and his other friends, Jō Ogura and Yasushi Watanabe, and bragged to them about the rape. Ogura reportedly asked Miyano to keep her in captivity in order to allow numerous people to sexually assault her. The group had a history of gang rape and had recently kidnapped and raped another girl, whom they released afterward.[8]

Around 3:00 a.m., Miyano took Furuta to a nearby park, where Minato, Ogura, and Watanabe were waiting.[8] They had learned her home address from a notebook in her backpack and told her that they knew where she lived, and that yakuza members would kill her family if she attempted to escape. The four boys overpowered her, took her to a house in the Ayase district of Adachi, and gang-raped her.[8] The house, which was owned by Minato's parents, soon became their regular gang hangout.[10]

On 27 November, Furuta's parents contacted the police about her disappearance. To discourage further investigation, the kidnappers forced her to call her mother and say she had run away, but was safe and staying with some friends. They also forced Furuta to stop the police investigation. When Minato's parents were present, Furuta was forced to act as his girlfriend.[11] They dropped this pretense when it became clear that Minato's parents would not report them to the police.[10] The Minatos stated that they did not intervene because they were aware of Miyano's yakuza connections and feared retaliation, and because their own son was increasingly violent toward them.[10]

The group held Furuta captive in the Minato residence for 40 days, where they repeatedly beat, raped, and tortured her.[8] According to their statements, the four shaved her pubic hair, forced her to dance to music while naked and masturbate in front of them, and left her on the balcony in the middle of the night with little clothing. They inserted objects into her vagina and anus, including a lit match, a metal rod, and a bottle, and force-fed her with large amounts of alcohol, milk and water. She was also forced to smoke multiple cigarettes at once and inhale paint thinner. In one incident, Miyano repeatedly burned Furuta's legs and arms with lighter fluid. By the end of December, Furuta was severely malnourished after being fed only small amounts of food and eventually only milk.[8] Due to her severe injuries and infected burns, she became unable to go to the downstairs toilet, and became confined to the floor of Minato's room in a state of extreme weakness.[8]

Furuta's appearance was drastically altered from the brutality of the attacks. Her face was so swollen that it was difficult to make out her features. Her body was also severely crippled, giving off a rotting smell that caused the four boys to lose sexual interest in her. As a result, the boys kidnapped and gang-raped a 19-year-old woman who, like Furuta, was on her way home from work.[citation needed]

On 4 January 1989, after losing a game of mahjong against another person the night before, Miyano decided to vent his anger towards Furuta.[12] In their anger, they poured lighter fluid onto her thighs, arms, face, and stomach and set her on fire once again.[8] Furuta allegedly made attempts to put out the fire, but gradually became unresponsive.[8] They continued to punch her, ignited a candle and dripped hot wax on her face, placed two short candles on her eyelids, and forced her to drink her own urine. After she was kicked, she fell onto a stereo unit and collapsed into a fit of convulsions.[8] Since she was bleeding profusely, and pus was emerging from her infected burns, the four boys covered their hands in plastic bags.[8] They continued to beat her and dropped an iron exercise ball onto her stomach several times. The attack reportedly lasted two hours. Furuta eventually succumbed to her wounds and died.[8]

Less than 24 hours after her death, Minato's brother called to tell him that Furuta appeared to be dead. Afraid of being penalized for murder, the group wrapped her body in blankets and shoved her into a travel bag. They then put her body in a 55-gallon (208 liter) drum and filled it with wet concrete. Around 8:00 p.m., they loaded it and eventually disposed the drum into a cement truck in Kōtō, Tokyo.[13]

On 23 January 1989, Miyano and Ogura were arrested for the gang-rape of the 19-year-old girl whom they had kidnapped in December. On 29 March, two police officers came to interrogate them, as women's underwear had been found at their addresses. During the interrogation, Miyano believed that one of the officers was aware of his culpability in Furuta's murder. Thinking that Jō Ogura had confessed to the crimes against Furuta, Miyano told the police where to find Furuta's body. The police were initially puzzled by the confession, as they had been referring to the murder of a different woman and her seven-year-old son that had occurred nine days prior to Furuta's abduction, a case which remains unsolved.

The police found the drum containing Furuta's body the following day. She was identified via fingerprints. On 1 April 1989, Jō Ogura was arrested for a separate sexual assault, and subsequently re-arrested for Furuta's murder. The arrest of Watanabe, Minato, and Minato's brother followed. Several other accomplices who participated in Furuta's abuse were officially identified, including Tetsuo Nakamura and Koichi Ihara, who were charged with rape after their DNA was found on and inside the victim's body.[8]

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand Furry Love. The humour is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most of the jokes will go over a typical viewer's head. There's also Fury Girl's nihilistic outlook, which is deftly woven into her characterisation- her personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these jokes, to realise that they're not just funny- they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Furry Love truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn't appreciate, for instance, the humour in Fury Girl's existential catchphrase "Wubba Lubba Dub Dub," which itself is a cryptic reference to Turgenev's Russian epic Fathers and Sons. I'm smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Red Six Development's genius wit unfolds itself on their computer screens. What fools.. how I pity them. 😂

And yes, by the way, i DO have a furry Love tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It's for the ladies' eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they're within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid 😎
